attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I originally downloaded it for memes about the crusty orange and information to get trump out the White House, but instead I came across supporters 🤮 On top of that every time I log off the app my phone glitches nonstop! I would definitely not recommend this app...

attributes.title: Worst dating app EVER
attributes.review: I thought this was a dating app? Really disappointed to see that they asked for my number IMMEDIATELY. I’m not that kind of girl. And then when I matched with this one guy named Donald, it said that thousands of other middle aged white women were already simp-ing him?!?! Uh uh. I’m taking my business elsewhere.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app runs EXTREMELY slow, it sends me way too many notifications, and it makes my battery run out in a matter of seconds. I don’t not recommend getting this app whatsoever. I’m giving one star for the effort, but nothing else, toodles. 😗✌🏼

attributes.title: oh brother this guy stinks
attributes.review:
True love is like a vast grassland
Layers of wind and rain cannot be blocked
There will always be clouds at sunrise
The vast sun illuminates you and me
True love blooms like plum blossoms
Can't hide the cold snow
Just the coldest
Branch bloom
See spring walking towards you and me
Snow fluttering north wind howling
The sky and the sky
A cut plum
Proudly in the snow
Only for Yiren fragrance
Love what I love without regrets
This love stays long
Between heart
Snow fluttering north wind howling
The sky and the sky
A cut plum
Proudly in the snow
Only for Yiren fragrance
Love what I love without regrets
This love stays long
Between heart

attributes.title: Horrible experience
attributes.review: Originally I downloaded this app because our lord and savior Jesus Christ told me to in my sleep but, this app is sooooooooo slow and glitches a lot. Also I get at least a thousand notifications a day. I’m sorry Trump sama but I must give your glorious app a one star😢

attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for entertainment purposes. My stupid pet dinosaur decided to eat it because the app produced annoying noises. My Chihuahua then ate my refrigerator and puked all of my food everywhere. This app needs to be taken down right away before anyone else gets hurt.

attributes.title: Ban trump
attributes.review: This app is terrible if stole my stegosaurs 👮‍♀️like what da heck I had to call da police 👩‍💻and I went on da app and a hand came out and stole my two front teeth 🐰and next thing i know I walk out to a cup of retarted juice and he stole it 🐻 next morning my parents call me downstairs to ask if I stole the fridge 🐄ALSO THE WORST PART IS HES TRYING TO TAKE TIKTOK FROM ME🔫

attributes.title: This app broke my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within 10 seconds of opening it my ENTIRE phone froze and when it finally went back to normal, all of my pictures from 2016-now were gone.

attributes.title: Completely Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and before I even opened it my phone shut down and my cat started freaking out! I then saw the ghosts of all the oranges that Trump killed for their color😭🍊 RIP oranges.... they told me this app would ruin your phone !!!

attributes.title: dis cus tan
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever used in my life, i downloaded it to support my beautiful skinny not orange minority loving non racist non homophobic non sexist president. but all i got on the app were lies! i was shocked to see a naked orange man on the app dancing and shaking his pp in the camera for small children to see. appalling 🥱. sometimes i don’t wanna be happy, and this app jus made my day worse. it’s glitchy and horrible. it made my phone shut down not once, but twice. i cannot believe people like this. delete this!
